page.title: 11Housing in Barrow Hill
page.content: Barrow Hill is the largest settlement in our D block.The houses are of 4 main types.{1.The Blocks.}These are dull brown stone faced buildings built before the turn of the century.Each Block used to house 3 families but now houses 2 after modernisation.{Railway {Terraces.}These were built about 1880 and still have arched windows.They were built for railway workers.{3. {1930's Council houses.}These reddy brown brick houses looked nice to live in and have big gardens.{4. Modern low {rise council houses.}These were the newest houses, less than ten years old,and were small and compact with tiny gardens and landscaped areas in between.
